ext_weather.name: Today
ext_weather.shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Rain And Snow
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain between 11am and 2pm, then rain and snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 38. North wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
